LITB104.title: Beaver's Bike
LITB104.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 104 Beaver's Bike.m4v
LITB104.description: Beaver loses his new bicycle to a clever thief after convincing his parents to let him ride it to school with his friends, Whitey and Larry.

SOKO21.title: The Terrifying Space Mummy
SOKO21.description: The Space Mummy has poisoned the water supply so anyone who drinks it is turned into a mummy.

LITB105.title: Wally's Orchid
LITB105.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 105 Wally's Orchid.m4v
LITB105.description: Wally worries that popular Myra won't go with him to the sophomore spring dance if he can't afford to buy her an expensive orchid corsage.

CSMS11.title: The Persistence of Memory
CSMS11.description: Carl Sagan examines life on earth discussing genes, DNA, the brain, and human social development.

LISP21.title: The Magic Mirror
LISP21.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 21 The Magic Mirror.m4v
LISP21.description: Penny stumbles into an alien mirror and finds a universe occupied by one very lonely boy.

SPRA41.title: The Car Destroyer
SPRA41.description: Dr J.D. Crepit, a mad scientist who hates cars because his son was crippled in an auto accident, plots to destroy all the cars in the world.

STAN21.title: How Sharper than a Serpent's Tooth
STAN21.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 21 How Sharper than a Serpent's Tooth.m4v
STAN21.description: The Enterprise runs into a being which once visited Earth and influenced the Mayan culture.

LISP19.title: Ghost in Space
LISP19.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 19 Ghost in Space.m4v
LISP19.description: Trying to contact his Uncle Thaddeus during a séance, Doctor Smith summons a ghostly monster native to the planet.

LITB101.title: School Sweater
LITB101.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 101 School Sweater.m4v
LITB101.description: When a pretty co-ed borrows his letterman sweater, hapless Wally soon learns the hard way that she didn't want it just because she was cold.

GODZ11.title: Godzilla vs. Hedorah
GODZ11.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/Godzilla vs. Hedorah (Godzilla vs. the Smog Monster, Godzilla #11, 1971, dubbed).mp4

POIR09.title: The King of Clubs
POIR09.description: A deck with a missing card provides Poirot with the clue he needs to solve the murder of the tyrannical head of a movie studio.

MSLV1962.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance

LISP20.title: War of the Robots
LISP20.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 20 War of the Robots.m4v
LISP20.description: After the Robinsons repair a damaged robot, it first helps them and then plots to capture them.

LITB102.title: The Hypnotist
LITB102.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 102 The Hypnotist.m4v
LITB102.description: Rascally Eddie Haskell pretends to be Beaver's hypnotized slave.

ULTR21J.path: ../Ultraman (Japanese, Engligh Subtitled)/Ultraman - 21 Breach the Wall of Smoke.mp4
ULTR21J.title: Breach the Wall of Smoke

LITB103.title: Wally and Alma
LITB103.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 103 Wally and Alma.m4v
LITB103.description: Ward and June start to worry when it looks like the matchmaker mother of Wally's school picnic date, Alma Hanson, is arranging for young Wally and her pretty daughter to spend too much time together.

SPRA42.title: The Desperate Racer
SPRA42.description: Trixie wants Speed to lose a race, so that her friend's brother will win and use the prize money to heal her. Meanwhile, a royal jewel is hidden inside a pineapple - one of many given to the competing racers.

GDSS1934.title: The Goddess
GDSS1934.description: 神女 tells the story of an unnamed woman, who lives as a streetwalker by night and devoted mother by day in order to get her young son an education amid social injustice in the streets of Shanghai, China.

LISP18.title: The Sky Pirate
LISP18.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 18 The Sky Pirate.m4v
LISP18.description: Will becomes fast friends with Captain Alonzo P. Tucker, an Earthling who escaped his alien captors to become a wandering space buccaneer. But Tucker's roguish charm hides a secret that could destroy them all.
